thread.section_title: DME Hub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DME Hub | dmehub.net
thread.title: Allan Ritchie
thread.title_full: DME Hub reviewed by Allan Ritchie

author: Allan Ritchie
title: Allan Ritchie
text:
Five stars does not do this company justice.
DME Hub's Tyler Wright saved me a significant amount of money through his intimate knowledge of TiLite and his willingness to share.
Got only the parts I needed for the repair. Other companies Quote: d for parts I did not require which would have cost me significantly more.
I saved additional money on technician call-out fees via Tyler's guidance on how to fit the parts myself, as well as diagnosing other issues my chair had and, more importantly, how to fix them through simple adjustment.
All advice was freely given with the offer to get back in touch with any other issues I may have in the future. I certainly will not be going elsewhere in future.
Allan, Aberdeenshire, Scotland, UK
